io.github.thebusybiscuit.slimefun4.core.services

Class UpdaterService

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.thebusybiscuit.slimefun4.core.services.UpdaterService

  • public class UpdaterService
extends java.lang.Object
    This Class represents our Updater Service. If enabled, it will automatically connect to https://thebusybiscuit.github.io/builds/ to check for updates and to download them automatically.
    Author:
    TheBusyBiscuit

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      UpdaterService(Plugin plugin, java.io.File file) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void disable()
      This method is called when the UpdaterService was disabled.
      SlimefunBranch getBranch()
      This method returns the branch the current build of Slimefun is running on.
      void start()
      This will start the UpdaterService and check for updates.

    • Constructor Detail

      • UpdaterService

        public UpdaterService(Plugin plugin,
                      java.io.File file)

    • Method Detail

      • getBranch

        public SlimefunBranch getBranch()
        This method returns the branch the current build of Slimefun is running on. This can be used to determine whether we are dealing with an official build or a build that was unofficially modified.
        Returns:
        The branch this build of Slimefun is on.

      • start

        public void start()
        This will start the UpdaterService and check for updates. If it can find an update it will automatically be installed.

      • disable

        public void disable()
        This method is called when the UpdaterService was disabled.
